tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mask with Garland and ears; Mask with Beard and Ears of Satyr", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and light brown ink, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3055.
